title: Statement from White House Counsel | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




January 21, 2009

 



Statement from White House Counsel




Â THE WHITE HOUSE    Office of the Press Secretary   For Immediate Release January 21, 2009    The following is a statement from White House Counsel Greg Craig.   "We believe that the oath of office was administered effectively and that the President was sworn in appropriately yesterday. But the oath appears in the Constitution itself. And out of an abundance of caution, because there was one word out of sequence, Chief Justice Roberts administered the oath a second time."     THE WHITE HOUSE, January 21, 2009.
